customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

customer_reviews.title: Best buy and quality for the product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price and great quality. After charged, you can use it cordless and has long charge life. Very easy to clean. I would recommend to buy. I’ve tried 3 different types and this by far the best.

product_meta.title: KOODER Multifunctional Rechargeable Fabric Shaver, Lint Remover, Combines Both Shaving and Brushing Function
product_meta.description:
Specification paramete 
Power rating: 4W 
Rated voltage: 110V 
Rated power: 50 Hz 
Charging time: 8 hours 
Blade mode: Rotary type 

★ Method to use 
Push up the switch to open and then began to cut clothes. Spread clothes on table, use the machine on clothes and move slowly. To avoid broken clothes, be careful around places where fluff is tangle. 

★ Please fully charge the machine in first use 
1.switches off and close the Fabric Shaver , plug the charger into 110V alternating current electrical socket 
2.The charge light switch on means the machine is charging. Standard charge time is 8-10 hours 
3.Charging is complete, unplug the charging cable.Try to charge before machine’s battery completely used up in order to extended the battery life 

★ Clear 
1.Switch off the machine 
2.Use cleaning brush to clean machine net cover and the fluff balls store in the top of the machine 
3.After cleaning, please replace the dust collecting box and the net cover back to the machine and secure safely 

★ Money Back Guarantee: If the fabric shaver invalid, we will refund 100% of your purchase.
